search() - Method in class mru.game.controller.GameManager
This method calls the showSubMenu from the appMenu class This method will display the sub menu It will prompt the user for three choices, find top player, search player name, and a return to main menu option

showPlayer(Player) - Method in class mru.game.view.AppMenu
The showPlayer method Executes when the user searches for a player The methods outputs the name, balance, and number of wins the players has If the player does not exist or is not found, the output will say "No record found for that name"
